channel.title: Comments on: My first spring festival
channel.description: Won't you join me for a crazy crazy China adventure?

item.title: by: Amy Bugg
item.description: Will, I can't believe I just read this blog and the next one today...being out of town last weekend must have thrown me off my game. I assure you that I AM a faithful blog-believer. I do hope that you had a wonderful birthday, and I hope you are having fun out there in your dorky cap. I love you mucho! Can't wait to hear your stories when you get back "home!"
item.content:encoded: Will, I can’t believe I just read this blog and the next one today…being out of town last weekend must have thrown me off my game. I assure you that I AM a faithful blog-believer. I do hope that you had a wonderful birthday, and I hope you are having fun out there in your dorky cap. I love you mucho! Can’t wait to hear your stories when you get back “home!”

item.title: by: elenore
item.description: god that is so cool!!!!! Thailand will have to wait happy soon birthday and have a great time i am serious about trying to visit i will write you an official e-mail once i figure out the reality of it you know$$$ but it would be in July believe maybe for 2 weeks
item.content:encoded:
god that is so cool!!!!!
Thailand will have to wait
happy soon birthday
and have a great time
i am serious about trying to visit
i will write you an official e-mail once i figure out the reality of it
you know$$$
but it would be in July believe maybe for 2 weeks
